title: champions won from chests
body: i got Ivern from a chest but I do not know how to make permanent. what is required.

replies.body: Nice, grats on grabbing an Ivern shard.  :D  It doesn't look like you have any currently, but you can obtain blue shards and use it to unlock Ivern.  Blue shards can be found through hextech chests or a disenchanted mystery champion shard at the store.  Let me know if that clears things up, and enjoy the jungle in peace.  :D
oh...:(... that clears everything ... really appreciate it.. thank god i have another chest... just need to find two more keys to unlock it.... thx again... :)
